channel.title: Slave Bot 372 Released by IMPSOFT
channel.description:
Today Slave Bot has been Released for Runescrape MC #372
More Information Etc and general Discussion @ http://www.impsoft.net
[img]http://www.impsoft.net/files/slave%20bot%20ad.PNG[/img]
Woohooo Slave Bot 372

item.title: Slave Bot 372 Released by IMPSOFT
item.dc:creator: @Krichevskoy Krichevskoy
item.description:
@Krichevskoy wrote:

I'm sorry, a "war" with that community?
What are you, ten? On top of selling Aryan and now, apparently, ripping from it, you threaten anyone who removes your authentication and any bystanders who just happened to pick the wrong message board with an illegal DoS war? And over what, a RuneScape bot? Don't make me call your parents.

Read full topic

item.title: Slave Bot 372 Released by IMPSOFT
item.dc:creator: @Taios Taios
item.description:
@Taios wrote:

GenoDemoN:

[quote author=jme_009 link=topic=1379.msg13015#msg13015 date=1144883700]
Your payment plan is somehwhat... err.. Montly fee's really turn people away, you should consider a one time fee.

I'd probably buy it(after I hear testimonials) if it were not for those montly fee's.

well you see lets say we do a one time fee of 50$,, you have it then what keeps the incentive to keep the bot @ 100% instead of keeping the money and letting it degrad (example sbot3) and if people only want to use it for a bit 15$ for 5 weeks is cheap for how much you can make, take sbot 100$ and at most people had was 12 weeks here for 36$ you can have the same. need i say more?[/quote]

SBoT2 was released back roughly in october 2005.... so for those buying an early auth, they had it for a while.

Read full topic

item.title: Slave Bot 372 Released by IMPSOFT
item.dc:creator: @ruler ruler
item.description:
@ruler wrote:

Arkanor:

[quote author=Miss Silabsoft link=topic=1379.msg13208#msg13208 date=1144906182]
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,1418.0.html

now you dont have to pay

Er.

I still don't get (and I'm being completely honest about this) why people make such a big deal out of IMPSoft selling Aryan updates. If nobody wants to buy their version, then there are other updaters working for free out there. Why the hate and 'leaking' of IMPSoft stuff, albeit in an 'improved' form?[/quote]
dont worry I have a list of sites associated with them.
They are being delt with.
Not to angry for the mouse still needs optimaztion and improvement. This is more of a beta.

Mark, remove the aryanrune cut. I am going to try get dcthugs to keep it going, he lost his auth db, www.aryanrune.com aryanrune.impsoft.net

Read full topic
